name: Puckle's Odyssey
description:
Embark on a journey to discover the meaning of home. Is it a place you have to look forward to? Or is it something you can always keep to your heart wherever you go?

Made for Global Game Jam 2019
  • Programming - Zwe Wai Yan Htet
  • Art - Ye Mon Aung
  • Programming - Zhu Zhiji
  • Music & Levels - Lim Hoe Kit
